content: उदित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Risen, ascended; उदितभूयिष्ठः <ls>Māl. 1</ls> mostly risen; <ls>Bv. 2. 85</ls>; नित्योदितः <ls>Bh. 3. 80</ls> ever-existing. {@--2@} High, tall, lofty. {@--3@} Grown, augmented. {@--4@} Born, produced. {@--5@} Spoken, uttered (<ab>fr.</ab> वद्). --तं {@--1@} A kind of perfume. {@--2@} A kind of accent.
